content.raw: Not sure why this is marked resolved. The Multisense models of CR (https://bitbucket.org/crl/multisense_ros/src/d778bd8ea1fdc4759ef14e57b0022b55d60b9180/multisense_description/urdf/multisenseSL.urdf?at=default) and drcsim (#!/osrf/drcsim/src/ef20eebcb1d8b14e650fca70724c9f14d087327d/multisense_sl_description/urdf/multisense_sl_v4.urdf?at=default) differ significantly. I nominate the fact that they have different root links as the most annoying difference, as that makes interchanging the models much harder than it should be.
